<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Verdant Branch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2162)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Woody vines and branches curl and twist around each other, growing small twigs, leaves, and flowers across the surface of this prosthetic arm or leg.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** A branch grows from your prosthesis, quickly flowering and then producing 1d4 ripe and flavorful fruits. A creature can pick and eat a fruit with an Interact action to regain 2d6+5 Hit Points. The fruits wither away after 10 minutes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
